TopicTitle: Remove one letter from a game title and describe the new game in a single line

Articles.Content:
Oom.

First person shooter with unlimited monsters number.

Edited July 10, 2017 by kerbiloid

Oregon Rail: This early classic educates players on the rail systems of the state of Oregon through gameplay and graphics that are considered outdated but cute by today's standards.

X-Plan: This obscure game based loosely off of an X-Men movie was one of the largest flops of July 2011, even though many observers were unsure about a flight simulator that was released at the same time called Kerbal Space Program. Obviously, you shouldn't always trust observers.
Clive Barker's U Dying: Save the English Language from American Spelling.

Amnesia: A Machine for pis...

If your memory is poor, this alarm clock keeps your pants dry.

rey, a horrifying game about the force-user from the force awakens

You don`t need to add anything else to make it scaryer, its that bad
Leisure Sit Larry:  A chair simulator, quite relaxing.

Kerbal Space rogram

Kerbals have to make space rugs.

Happy Heels - try on shoes and stuff make your feet happy.

TarCraft - make stuff out of tar, and try not to die.

StarRaft - You're stuck, floating through space, with nothing but an inflatable raft... Why is it up there, you ask? You could ask the same thing about the car.

The Great Train Robery - A strange, eccentric man bought his own train to house his touring robery from which he sells robes of all kinds all over the continent. Your task is to prevent the evil Silas Richardson from killing him and stealing his solid gold robe (not very wearable).

Quote

Just Cause 3

Jst Cause 3: A game where a space telescope must destroy the bad government.

Battlefeld 1:

A game in which you play a weaponized Jerry Seinfeld.
Moobase Alpha - A game involving space cows running a moon base. (Moonbase Alpha)
CIVILIZATION SI - The Spanish version of Civilization. Or it could be Civilization: Sports Illustrated edition.

Quote

Pacman

ac-Man

Become an electrical engineer and fix the Grid before the nation goes into anarchy.
Assett Corsa- A game where you calculate the wealth of all your assets and everything else you own. (Assetto Corsa)

Heroes of Might and Magic II.

A prequel to Heroes of Might and Magic III.

Warhamer 40k: A music game where the player uses a Hamer brand guitar.

Oat simulator: A game where you play as an oat plant, and have to compete with all the other oats to survive.

Edited March 5, 2018 by roboslacker
left out the k
Tarbound: like Starbound, but all planets are Tar biome.
